name: gradido-blockchain-js
description: Gradido Blockchain Library as Native Node Module

scripts.swig: swig-jse -DGIT_BRANCH="%{ // Generated by SWIG on branch `git branch --show-current` `date` %}" -javascript -typescript -napi -c++ -split -exports '../lib/index.cjs' -Ideps/gradido_blockchain/src -Ideps/gradido_blockchain/include -o swig/gradido-blockchain-js.cxx -outdir swig src/gradido-blockchain.i

author: Dario Rekowski <dario.rekowski@gmx.de>
